content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: bone_block
inventory=[{"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 9, "index": 15}, {"type": "tall_grass", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "jungle_trapdoor", "quantity": 46, "index": 19}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone", "quantity": 53, "index": 21}, {"type": "oak_sign", "quantity": 14, "index": 30}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 48, "index": 32}, {"type": "magenta_concrete", "quantity": 11, "index": 37}, {"type": "mycelium", "quantity": 17, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a bone block, I need to move 9 bone meal into the crafting table. I will move one bone meal from slot 15 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1
